title: MYK Portfolio Website
description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS featuring dynamic content management and admin panel.
full_description: A full-stack portfolio website with admin panel, contact form, review system, and database integration. Features include responsive design, dark mode, email notifications, and content management system. Built with production-ready architecture using Supabase as backend.

title: Job Portal - SQL Backend
description: Comprehensive job portal backend with advanced SQL queries, user management, and job application system.
full_description: A complete job portal backend built with MySQL featuring advanced filtering, user-to-application relationships, and normalized database design. Includes complex multi-criteria job filtering and data integrity management.

title: DSA Toolkit - Sliding Window & Linked Lists
description: Comprehensive C++ toolkit implementing sliding window techniques and linked list operations with modular design.
full_description: A complete data structures and algorithms toolkit focusing on sliding window problems and linked list operations. Features modular programming design with memory management and reusable components for various DSA problems.

title: Hostel Management System
description: Object-oriented hostel management system built in C++ with file handling for student and room allocation management.
full_description: A comprehensive hostel management system using OOP principles to model students, rooms, and allocations. Features menu-driven programming design with file I/O for data persistence without requiring a database.
challenges: Keeping logic organized in large code files

title: Pharmacy Management System
description: Full-featured pharmacy management system with Python backend, MySQL database, and tkinter GUI for inventory and sales management.
full_description: A comprehensive pharmacy management system integrating Python backend with MySQL database. Features modules for Inventory, Sales, Billing, and Reports with dynamic report generation and real-time stock management.

title: ATM Banking System
description: Object-oriented ATM simulation system built in C++ with file handling and security features.
full_description: A complete ATM banking system simulation using class-based design. Features real-world banking logic including deposit, withdrawal, balance check, and basic PIN protection with file-based data persistence.

title: Student Admission & Academic Record System
description: C-based student record management system using structs and procedural programming with file persistence.
full_description: A comprehensive student admission and academic record management system built in C. Uses structs and functions for record management with persistent file storage for handling student data efficiently.

title: KFT Social Welfare Organization Website
description: Responsive website for KFT Social Welfare Organization built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring modern design.
full_description: A professional website for KFT Social Welfare Organization focusing on clean design, mobile responsiveness, and intuitive navigation. Features custom animations, Bootstrap integration, and optimized user experience.

title: Social Media App MVP
description: Leading a 7-member team to develop a comprehensive social media application with chat, short videos, and snap-like stories.
full_description: A full-scale social media platform MVP with real-time messaging, short video processing, and Snap-like stories functionality. Leading a diverse team of frontend, backend, and UI/UX developers using Flutter and Firebase.

title: UI/UX Design Portfolio
description: Collection of UI/UX design projects including mobile apps, web interfaces, and user experience studies.
full_description: A comprehensive portfolio of UI/UX design work featuring mobile app interfaces, web design mockups, and user experience studies. Includes work on various design tools and user-centered design principles.

title: AI Chatbot System
description: Intelligent chatbot system with natural language processing and automated response capabilities.
full_description: An AI-powered chatbot system featuring natural language processing, automated responses, and learning capabilities. Built with modern AI frameworks and designed for scalable conversation management.

title: Eid Greeting Application
description: Interactive Eid greeting application with customizable messages and festive animations.
full_description: A festive Eid greeting application featuring customizable greeting messages, beautiful animations, and sharing capabilities. Built with modern web technologies for an engaging user experience.
